snippet: The company expects to raise about $350 million in an initial public offering on the Euronext exchange in Paris in the first half of this year.
abstract: DealBook Online; Labco announces that it expects to raise at least 320 million euros in initial public offering, which it has filed to pursue in first half of 2015.
lead_paragraph: The company expects to raise about $350 million in an initial public offering on the Euronext exchange in Paris in the first half of this year.

headline.main: Labco, French Medical Diagnostics Firm, Files for I.P.O.
